funding-source.institution: Regents of the University of California from the Foundation for the National Institutes of Health through the Grand Challenges in Global Health Initiative.

funding-group.funding-statement: This project was supported by the following grants: NIH/NIAID-R01AI095491 (LCH), Cornell Affinito Stewart Sabbatical Grant (LCH), and the Regents of the University of California through The Foundation for the National Institutes of Health and Grand Challenges in Global Health Initiative (KEO, WCB, ISV, JBD). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
